Question.Subject: Lockerz February redemption?
Question.Content: Was the general redemption today laggy? Like the waves from yesterday? was there a lot of traffic or was there no lagging? and were there a lot of prizes left?
Question.ChosenAnswer: fool, there was like 15 seconds to grab an item, i was constantly refreshing, and then all of a sudden, Lockerz stated that they went live, and i clicked on ptz place, and within 15 seconds, everything was gone alot of people seriously got nothin

Answer.Content: fool, there was like 15 seconds to grab an item, i was constantly refreshing, and then all of a sudden, Lockerz stated that they went live, and i clicked on ptz place, and within 15 seconds, everything was gone alot of people seriously got nothin
